abstract: European rabbis urge Vatican to stop attempts to reconcile with Society of St Pius X, group of ultra-traditionalist Catholics, until movement pledges to renounce members who rabbis say are anti-Semitic.
snippet: European rabbis urged the Vatican on Wednesday to stop any attempts to reconcile with the Society of St. Pius X, a group of ultra-traditionalist Catholics.
lead_paragraph: European rabbis urged the Vatican on Wednesday to stop any attempts to reconcile with the Society of St. Pius X, a group of ultra-traditionalist Catholics.

headline.main: Rabbis Ask Vatican Not to Reconcile With Group
headline.print_headline: Rabbis Ask Vatican Not to Reconcile With Group
